description: This file defines a service class for managing services via API calls, including CRUD operations, deployment, status checks, metrics, logs, validation, cloning, import/export, and deployment history.

classes.name: ServiceProvisioningService
classes.description: A class providing methods to interact with the service management API endpoints

methods.name: getServices
methods.description: Retrieve a paginated list of services with optional search term

methods.name: getService
methods.description: Retrieve details of a specific service by ID

methods.name: createService
methods.description: Create a new service with provided data

methods.name: updateService
methods.description: Update an existing service by ID with new data

methods.name: deployService
methods.description: Deploy a service to target devices

methods.name: undeployService
methods.description: Undeploy a service from target devices

methods.name: getServiceStatus
methods.description: Get the current deployment and health status of a service

methods.name: getServiceMetrics
methods.description: Retrieve metrics for a service, optionally within a time range

methods.name: getServiceLogs
methods.description: Fetch logs for a service with optional limit and log level

methods.name: validateServiceConfiguration
methods.description: Validate a service configuration before deployment

methods.name: previewServiceDeployment
methods.description: Preview deployment commands and estimated duration for a service

methods.name: getDeploymentHistory
methods.description: Get history of deployments for a service

methods.name: rollbackService
methods.description: Rollback a service to a previous deployment ID

methods.name: cloneService
methods.description: Clone an existing service with a new name

methods.name: exportService
methods.description: Export the service configuration as a blob

methods.name: importService
methods.description: Import a service configuration from a file
